price: 57.  N’eût été la grâce de mon Seigneur, j’aurais été du nombre de ceux (appelés) à comparaître (pour le supplice).
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا نِعۡمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡضَرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walawlā niʿ'matu rabbī lakuntu mina al-muḥ'ḍarīna
